name: Being an artist in hell
description:
Controls: A D to go left and right, Space to shoot if you have ammo, P to pause.

This is a project I've started years ago, and this is kind of the first one, that I've put some real effort into.

The plot is basically: you are an artist who is in hell now, and Satan thinks you might help decorating the place.

Did a revision of this not so long ago, made win/loss conditions, fixed some bugs, added pause, etc. Everything should work but it's far from ideal.
